name: Spaghetti With Parmesan Cheese
keywords: basil, linguine, parmesan, main course, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup finely shredded fresh basil leaves
1/2 cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese, plus additional cheese to be served on the side

recipeInstructions.text: Bring about 3 quarts water to a boil and add linguine, stirring down so the pasta is completely immersed in the water. Add salt and cook until tender, stirring strands often, 8 to 10 minutes. Drain.
Return pasta to the kettle it was cooked in, and add butter, olive oil, basil, pepper and 1/2 cup cheese, and toss to blend. Serve with additional Parmesan cheese on the side.
